data.content: This is a review lesson for the Communicative English from CLIx Level 1. It assesses students' understanding of the topics covered in the unit.

• You will listen to vocabulary related to family and feelings, follow instructions related to location of objects and people in the world around us and understand descriptions of weather, days and times of the year.
  • You will follow short illustrated or instructional texts to complete the task.
  • You will write 1-2 lines about feelings, your family and friends, location of things in the world around you, the weather and your favourite pastime.
